long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zapkad Plugin allows you to easily import your LinkedIn contacts into Zapkad. 
Managing lead generation data in one centralised space is not easy. As you network and build contacts, they tend to be forgotten and not followed up. Using this app, you can easily import any networking contacts that you connect with at events into one central prospecting database.
